description: Bishnu Prasad Paudel is a senior Nepalese politician with a long career in public service. He is the vice-chairman of the Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxist–Leninist). He has served multiple times as the Deputy Prime Minister of Nepal and has headed various key ministries, including Finance, Home Affairs, and Defence. A five-time parliamentarian, Paudel has been elected from both Palpa and Rupandehi districts, notably defeating former Prime Minister Baburam Bhattarai in the 2013 Constituent Assembly election.
short_description: Nepalese politician and vice-chairman of the Communist Party of Nepal (Unified Marxist–Leninist), who has served multiple terms as Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance.
